response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both parties, as it is worth $1,500,000 to you and represents a remarkable investment for me. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $1,200,000.

This offer is designed to ensure that you receive a substantial discount while also allowing me to secure a fair return for my investment. I believe that this price reflects the true value of the product and presents an attractive proposition for you, given its potential for growth and utility.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am here to answer any questions you might have and assist you through the purchasing process. I look forward to the possibility of working together on this exciting acquisition.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
